selected_quotes: (BMJ) La asociación IECA o ARAII + diurético + AINE se asocia a un incremento del riesgo de fallo renal agudo OJO!!
Attention à la triplette bloqueurs du SRAA, diurétique et AINS, augmentation du risque d'IRA dans les 30 jours
¡Cuidado con tratar a los pacientes con la combinación IECA + ARA-II y AINE! riesgo elevado de daño renal
T2E1A2. Combinación de diuréticos, IECA o ARA II con AINEs aumenta riesgo de lesión renal. Vía
Combinación de IECAs + ARAII + AINEs, riesgo de daño renal.

citation.abstract: To assess whether a double therapy combination consisting of diuretics, angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors, or angiotensin receptor blockers with addition of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and the triple therapy combination of two of the aforementioned antihypertensive drugs to which NSAIDs are added are associated with an increased risk of acute kidney injury.
citation.title: Concurrent use of diuretics, angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors, and angiotensin receptor blockers with non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and risk of acute kidney injury: nested case-control study.

facebook.title: Photos from 社區藥局的五四三's post
facebook.summary:
【止痛藥的選擇】
「止痛新觀念，要止痛，先消炎！」
電視廣告上講著標準中文的老外，說著既不新又算不上正確的觀念，那畫面怪異的令人印象深刻。
止痛與消炎有什麼關係？所謂的消炎止痛藥有哪些、又該如何選擇呢？
本篇將著重於最常用的「非類固醇消炎止痛藥(NSAIDs)」做介紹與整理。
——————————————————————
一般常見的止痛藥大致分為三種：
(1)乙醯胺酚(Acetaminophen)，最常見的商品名就是大家熟知的普拿疼。
(2)非類固醇消炎止痛藥(NSAIDs)，本篇重點，下面將會詳述。
(3

news.title: Acute Kidney Injury Associated With Dual Antihypertensive Therapy And NSAIDs
news.summary: Adding a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) to dual antihypertensive therapy (a diuretic plus either an ACE inhibitor or an angiotensin receptor blocker) is associated with an increase in risk for kidney injury, according to a large new retrospec
